fullplot: Two young girls, Sveta and Dina, go on the run to avoid being kidnapped by the former associates of Dina's recently released gangster father.
plot: Two young girls, Sveta and Dina, go on the run to avoid being kidnapped by the former associates of Dina's recently released gangster father.
title: Syostry

tomatoes.consensus: Though at times melodramatic, Skins' harsh depiction of life on the reservation is an eye-opener.
